fields.customfield_10312:
# The modal for log in is removed
 # The text that says 
 "Crear una cuenta para agilizar tu próximo mensaje." will now have "Crear una cuenta" become a tappable link that opens the login module itself
 #  Center align the text "Tu mensaje a [Janet Leon|https://www.vivanuncios.com.mx/u-anuncios-del-vendedor/janet-leon/v1u109682457p1] sobre [Magnifica casa en renta amueblada $6,500 9381249330|https://www.vivanuncios.com.mx/a-renta-inmuebles/carmen/magnifica-casa-en-renta-amueblada-6-500-9381249330/1001508227110910968245709/] ha sido enviado."
fields.description:
As a not logged in buyer, I want to see a less intrusive prompt to log in, so that I can see related ads sooner. A/B test has not shown good enough results.

 

Mobile design: [https://zpl.io/anrMe3n]
Desktop design: https://zpl.io/VKNWyB8
fields.summary: Remove postfix increment operator from cursor

comments.body:
[~homer]  hi , there are two points I wanna to confirm.
 # how about desktop? follow mobile design or keep originally?  plz see the screenshot image in attachments files and tell me if text-align is ok when follow mobile .
 # when click the link ,Do we need pop up like other page? 

thx answering.

Hi Crystal - 
1) Desktop should follow mobile design exactly, but here it is https://zpl.io/VKNWyB8 
2) When you click on the link, it should just follow the same modal (aka pop-up) like all other pages.
3) Based on your screen shot, Screen Shot 2018-06-04 at 6.19.40 PM.png, I would make this change. Delete the last part ¡Crear Cuenta!  Instead, make the first 3 words on the sentence clickable "Crear una cuenta."  For desktop, the line single line, so that mensaje isn't by itself.

h3. *{color:#8eb021}branchName : ULIVZ-38357-replypage-login-hide{color}*
h3. *{color:#8eb021}Test-Plan : pop up like other page and change style{color}* ,
h3. *{color:#8eb021}PR : https://github.corp.ebay.com/ecg-global/bolt-2dot0-frontend/pull/1240{color}* ,
h3. *{color:#8eb021}pipeline :http://optimus-ci-ew9cw.vip.slc07.dev.ebayc3.com/job/bolt-2dot0-frontend_ULIVZ-38357-replypage-login-hide/view/Pipeline/ {color}*

 # The text that says 
"Crear una cuenta para agilizar tu próximo mensaje." will now have "Crear una cuenta" become a tappable link that opens the login module itself

Center align the text "Tu mensaje a [Janet Leon|https://www.vivanuncios.com.mx/u-anuncios-del-vendedor/janet-leon/v1u109682457p1] sobre [Magnifica casa en renta amueblada $6,500 9381249330|https://www.vivanuncios.com.mx/a-renta-inmuebles/carmen/magnifica-casa-en-renta-amueblada-6-500-9381249330/1001508227110910968245709/] ha sido enviado."
